name: fride
description: A single-server Discord-like app with real-time text, voice, and admin dashboard

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/types && npm run build --workspace=packages/design && npm run build --workspace=packages/ui && npm run build --workspace=packages/utils
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=apps/web && npm install --workspace=apps/signaling && npm install --workspace=packages/types && npm install --workspace=packages/design && npm install --workspace=packages/ui && npm install --workspace=packages/utils
